name: external-dice-roll-connector
title: External Dice Roll Connector
description:
This connector allows you to roll dice in your open Foundry VTT session from an external source.

Navigate to http://your.server:port/modules/external-dice-roll-connector/roll.html?roll=formula in the same browser, where 'formula' is your dice roll formula to be evaluated (e.g. "2d6 + 2").

See the README for details and sending a finished Roll object.

This module is based on the HTTP API module by KaKaRoTo.
author: bukiro
